name: Invasion Zero
description: Invasion Zero is a multi-player online free to play first-shooter game where you are able to play against enemy AI bots or players from all over the world.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher. Processor: Intel Core i5-3400 or higher. Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 358 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or higher. Processor: Intel Core i7-3770k or higher. Memory: 4089 MB RAM Graphics: 2048 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 12 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 358 MB available space
